= Addons Path Configuration

The converter `ConfigConverterAddonsPath` allow to convert environment variable related to addons path configuration to valid odoo CLI.

include::partial$addons_path.adoc[]


== addons_path
NOTE: Specify additional addons paths. use addons_git and addons_local with `Possible cli:

* --addons-path`

The environment variable `<object object at 0x78756c55d530>` is used and expect a csv value.
For example `<object object at 0x78756c55d530>="value1,value2"` or `<object object at 0x78756c55d530>="value1"` are valid value.

The value are automaticaly deduplicated. +
`<object object at 0x78756c55d530>="value1,value2"` and `<object object at 0x78756c55d530>="value2,value1,value2"` are the same.




== Other keys
